text:
NAEB NEWS LETTER
Page 5
December 15, 1941
WOIi Iowa State College, was denied request to operate additional
HOURS DURING DECEMBER TO BROADCAST THREE COLLEGE BASKETBALL GAME S .
02/3/41)
WRUW, World Wide Broadcasting Corporation, applied for construction
PERMIT TO MAKE CHANGES IN EQUIPMENT AND INCREASE POWER FROM 20 TO
50 KWo (12/5/41)
WNYC, NeW York City, was denied request to operate additional time
on December 7 and 14. (12/8/41)
WRUF, University of Florida, was granted special permission to
OPERATE LATE PERIOD ON DECEMBER 15 IN ORDER TO CARRY BILL OF RIGHTS
PROGRAM ONLY. ( I 2/10/4 I )
SCHOOLEY
